requirements: Open to non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
description:
An introduction to the varied histories of world drama and theater as an art form, as a profession, as a social event, and as an agent of cultural definition through the ages. DRAM 6a examines select theatrical cultures and performance practices to 1700. DRAM 6b examines select theatrical cultures and performance practices since 1700.
Open to non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
title: Survey of Theater and Drama
